name: ATHERD
description:
ATHERD

A prelude to DREATH. As such, related to 87 – An Epilogue and Peccata Mea trilogy.

Controls:

  • Move - WASD / LStick Movement
  • Look - Mouse / RStick Movement
  • Run - Shift / LShoulder
  • Crouch - Ctrl / RShoulder
  • Lean Left - Q / LTrigger
  • Lean Right - E / RTrigger
  • Interact - LMB / Gamepad A / Cross / RStick
  • Close Eyes - MMB / Gamepad X / Square
  • Menu - Esc / Start
